user.title: PowerSync Setup
user.description: Configure PowerSync to automatically sync electricity pricing to your Powerwall.

provider_selection.title: Select Electricity Provider
provider_selection.description:
Choose your electricity provider:

**Amber Electric**: Full real-time price sync using Amber API.

**Flow Power**: Wholesale electricity with Happy Hour exports. Choose AEMO or Amber pricing.

**Globird/VPP**: AEMO spike detection for VPP exports.

flow_power_setup.title: Flow Power Configuration
flow_power_setup.description:
Configure your Flow Power settings.

PEA (Price Efficiency Adjustment) uses Flow Power's actual billing model: Final Rate = Base Rate + (Wholesale - 9.7c).

Select your network tariff from the dropdown for fallback rates when PEA is disabled.

data.network_use_manual_rates: Use manual rates instead of automatic lookup
data.pea_custom_value: Custom PEA Override (c/kWh, leave empty for auto)
data.solar_curtailment_enabled: Enable Solar Curtailment (stop export at negative prices)

amber.title: Amber Electric Configuration
amber.description: Enter your Amber Electric API token. You can get this from {amber_url}

amber_settings.title: Amber Settings
amber_settings.description:
Configure spike protection and export boost settings.

Spike protection prevents grid charging during high prices.
Export boost triggers Powerwall exports at lower price points.

data_description.spike_protection_enabled: When Amber detects a price spike, artificially inflate buy prices to prevent Powerwall from charging from grid
data_description.settled_prices_only: Skip forecast sync at :00 and only sync when actual prices arrive at :35/:60
data_description.force_tariff_mode_toggle: After uploading a new tariff, briefly toggle Powerwall mode to force immediate recalculation
data_description.export_boost_threshold: Boost only applies if actual price is at or above this value (0 = always apply)

teslemetry.title: Teslemetry Configuration
teslemetry.description: Enter your Teslemetry API token. You can get this from {teslemetry_url}

site_selection.title: Site Selection
site_selection.description: Select your Tesla energy site and Amber site (if you have multiple), and configure sync options.

data.solar_curtailment_enabled: Enable Solar Curtailment (stop export at negative prices)

demand_charges.title: Demand Charge Configuration (Optional)
demand_charges.description: Configure demand charge tracking for electricity plans with capacity-based fees. Leave 'Enable Demand Charge Tracking' unchecked to skip this step.

init.title: Select Electricity Provider
init.description: Choose your electricity provider to configure provider-specific settings.

amber_options.title: Amber Electric Options
amber_options.description: Configure Amber Electric TOU sync, export boost, demand charges, and supply charges.

data.solar_curtailment_enabled: Enable Solar Curtailment (stop export at negative prices)
data.spike_protection_enabled: Enable Spike Protection (prevent grid charging during spikes)

data_description.spike_protection_enabled: When Amber detects a price spike, artificially inflate buy prices to prevent Powerwall from charging from grid (stops arbitrage behavior)
data_description.settled_prices_only: Skip the initial forecast sync at :00 and only sync when actual/settled prices arrive at :35/:60 seconds. Use this if forecast prices differ significantly from settled prices.
data_description.demand_artificial_price_enabled: Artificially increases the current price by $2 during demand charge periods to encourage battery discharge
data_description.export_boost_threshold: Boost will only apply if actual export price is at or above this value (0 = always apply)

flow_power_options.title: Flow Power Options
flow_power_options.description:
Configure Flow Power wholesale electricity with Happy Hour export rates (5:30pm-7:30pm: 45c NSW/QLD/SA, 35c VIC).

PEA (Price Efficiency Adjustment) uses Flow Power's actual billing: Final Rate = Base Rate + (Wholesale - 9.7c).

Network tariff is used when PEA is disabled.

data.network_use_manual_rates: Use manual rates instead of automatic lookup
data.pea_custom_value: Custom PEA Override (c/kWh, leave empty for auto)
data.solar_curtailment_enabled: Enable Solar Curtailment (stop export at negative prices)

globird_options.title: Globird - AEMO Spike Detection
globird_options.description: Configure AEMO wholesale price spike detection. When prices spike above your threshold, the Powerwall will export to the grid.

sync_tou_schedule.name: Sync TOU Schedule
sync_tou_schedule.description: Manually trigger a sync of Time-of-Use schedule from Amber to Tesla

sync_now.name: Sync Now
sync_now.description: Immediately refresh data from Amber and Tesla
